#include <vector>
#include <list>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <queue>
#include <deque>
#include <stack>
#include <bitset>
#include <algorithm>
#include <functional>
#include <numeric>
#include <utility>
#include <sstream>
#include <iostream>
#include <iomanip>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <ctime>
#include <cstring>
#include <climits>
#include <cctype>
#include <cassert>
#include <complex>

using namespace std;

#define ull unsigned long long
#define ill long long int
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define pb(x) push_back(x)
#define F(i,a,n) for(int i=(a);i<(n);++i)
#define FF(i,a,n) for(i=(a);i<(n);++i)
#define REP(i,a,n) for(i=(a);i<(n);++i)
#define FD(i,a,n) for(int i=(a);i>=(n);--i)
#define FE(it,x) for(it=x.begin();it!=x.end();++it)
#define V(x) vector<x>
#define S(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define Sl(x) scanf("%llu",&x)
#define M(x,i) memset(x,i,sizeof(x))
#define debug(i,sz,x) F(i,0,sz){cout<<x[i]<<" ";}cout<<endl
#define MAX(a,b) ((a)>(b)?(a):(b))
ill ABS(ill a) { if ( a < 0 ) return (-a); return a; }
#define fr first
#define se second

/* Relevant code begins here */

/* Input from file or online */

void input() {
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
#endif
}

/* Input opener ends */

int x[4], y[4];

double dis(double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) {
    double X = (x1-x2), Y = (y1-y2);
    return sqrt(X*X+Y*Y);
}

double ar(int from) {
    double d[3];
    F(i,0,3) {
        int t = (i+1)%3;
        int fi = (from+i)%4, ft = (from+t)%4;
        // cout << fi << " " << ft << endl;
        d[i] = dis(x[fi],y[fi],x[ft],y[ft]);
    } //cout << endl;
    double s = (d[0]+d[1]+d[2])/2; 
    return sqrt(s*(s-d[0])*(s-d[1])*(s-d[2]));
}

double arq() {
    double X1 = (x[0]-x[2]);
    double Y2 = (y[1]-y[3]);
    double X2 = (x[1]-x[3]);
    double Y1 = (y[0]-y[2]);
    double A = 0.5*(X1*Y2-X2*Y1);
    return 2.0*abs(A);
}

int gcd(int a,int b) {
    if ( !b ) return a;
    return gcd(b,a%b);
}

int main() {
    input();

    int t; S(t);
    int tst = 1;
    while ( t-- ) {
        
        F(i,0,4) { S(x[i]); S(y[i]); }
        // int area2 = 2.0*ar(0)+2.0*ar(2)+0.5;
        int area2 = arq() + 0.5;
        // cout << area2 << endl;
        // picks - area = i + b/2 - 1
        int b = 0;
        F(i,0,4) {
            int u = (i+1)%4;
            int X = max(x[u],x[i])-min(x[u],x[i]);
            int Y = max(y[u],y[i])-min(y[u],y[i]);
            int G = gcd(X,Y);
            // cout << X << " "<< Y << " " << G << endl;
            b += G;
        }
        // cout << b << endl;

        int i = area2 + 2 - b;
        i /= 2;
        int ans = b + i;

        printf("Case %d: %d\n", tst++, ans);
    }

    return 0;
}
